hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Do you have any exams coming up? stamina wave 1445 Laura Chaplin, Charlie Chaplin’s granddaughter, is an artist who lives between England and Switzerland – part of her work is dedicated to her grandfather. For her, the museum is the perfect way to celebrate the “Godfather” of silent movies: “Towards the end of his life he was worried that he would be forgotten because he’d worked so hard and he had a very strong message. I think that is what he wanted the most, to be remembered and people to hear his message still today.”
